Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
utilMDE.Assert
            
utilMDE.MultiReader
          use EntryReader instead 
utilMDE.TextFile
            
 

Deprecated Methods
utilMDE.UtilMDE.backTrace()
          use "backtrace(new Throwable())" instead, to avoid spurious "at utilMDE.UtilMDE.backTrace(UtilMDE.java:1491)" in output. 
utilMDE.UtilMDE.BufferedFileReader(String)
          use BufferedFileReader (note lowercase first letter) 
utilMDE.UtilMDE.BufferedFileWriter(String)
          use BufferedFileWriter (note lowercase first letter) 
utilMDE.UtilMDE.BufferedFileWriter(String, boolean)
          use bufferedFileWriter (note lowercase first letter) 
utilMDE.SimpleLog.exdent(String, Object...)
          Use separate calls to SimpleLog.exdent() and SimpleLog.log(String, Object...). 
utilMDE.EntryReader.get_filename()
            
utilMDE.EntryReader.get_line_number()
            
utilMDE.Options.ignore_options_after_arg(boolean)
          Use Options.parse_options_after_arg(boolean). 
utilMDE.UtilMDE.LineNumberFileReader(File)
          use lineNumberFileReader (note lowercase first letter) 
utilMDE.UtilMDE.LineNumberFileReader(String)
          use lineNumberFileReader (note lowercase first letter) 
utilMDE.Options.parse_and_usage(String)
          Use Options.parse_or_usage(String). 
utilMDE.Options.parse_and_usage(String[])
          Use Options.parse_or_usage(String[]). 
utilMDE.UtilMDE.setDefault(Properties, String, String)
          use setDefaultMaybe 
utilMDE.SimpleLog.start_time()
          Use SimpleLog.reset_start_time().
